communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: William Calley
communications.communication:
Dear Department of the Army:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. Please produce all records related to William Laws Calley Jr. Mr. Calley was born on June 8, 1943, in Miami, Florida, USA and died on April 8, 2024. Mr. Calley was a junior Army officer and held the rank of second lieutenant. He was the only person convicted in connection with the My Lai Massacre of 1968 during the Vietnam War.

PROOF OF DEATH:

Mr. Calley's news obituary from the Washington Post is attached.

CROSS-REFERENCE SEARCH:

In addition to your standard search practices, please also search your files regarding the My Lai Massacre to see if they contain additional records related to Mr. Calley.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you produce responsive records electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

Thank you very much.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz
